About Me

Hello future clients! Welcome to my website.

I am Chanservain from the republic of Congo, I am currently living in India for education purpose. I speak French, Lingala (both mother tongue) and conversational English.

I started my career on 2015, which leads me to become an experienced Front End developer and translator. I gained some strong work experience, ethic and team work bases which will be at your entire service. To provide an efficient and professional work, I use some tools and technologies such as SDL Trados Studio, Trello, Github, Discord, Slack etc. I aim to build a durable partnership with my future clients.

I have vast experience in Web Development. I can ensure a neat work with the latest technologies in the market and on-time delivery, I worked on many project either for clients, or personal training. I have over time perfectioned my Front End experience, mostly using SASS, Bootstrap, HTML5 & CSS3. I have also worked with Backed End Framework like Python Django 2.2, MERN etc.

About my linguistic career, I regularly work on the following services : - Document Translation (French, English, Lingala) - Data entry (Web entry, Form entry, Excel entry, General entry) - Transcription (Audio transcription, Video transcription) - Proofreading
